Tips for Building Your First Reproducible Research Doc with R üìö #Rstats #ReproducibleResearch 
1) Detail analysis steps
2) Start with tidy data
3) Document copiously
4) Try version control
5) Share
6) Use RMD/Quarto. 
Follow for an atomic essay/thread on each tip daily!
